QuestData.Title: Honor the Fallen
QuestData.Description: Hogarth, the commander of the Armory, is in the eastern tower. You must report your victory over Urtrak to him. Perhaps he will be friendly? Of course he may try to consume your soul. One can never tell with spirits such as these. $B$BThe Unyielding are still against us and will no doubt kill you if they can. Be careful $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Commander Hogarth in the Expedition Armory.
QuestData.RewardText: We lost our battle against the fel orcs so very long ago. You have restored some of our lost honor by killing Urtrak. $B$BTake one of our weapons with you. When you are fighting our most hated foes, use this weapon, and those who are free of our curse will come to your aid. $B$BBefore you leave, those who died at the siege tower wish to honor you for destroying our enemies.
